trends: There have been no other sightings in Jollyville
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting Detailsit was going down at 110 degrees to the south. it suddenly stopped and hoveredover the horizon. it constantly hovered and we ran inside in fear. then stephenlooked out the window and saw 2 figures standing in his yard. but his dog didntsee them for some reason... then chris had to go home and claims he saw anunusual head stick out of the gutter. he says it had glowing yellow eyes....
